name: Brimstone Noose
data: It increases the users strength adequately.
It decreases the users dexterity poorly.
It increases the users constitution impressively.
It decreases the users wisdom poorly.
It increases the users intelligence poorly.
It has average armour class for its type (pathetic in general).
It increases the users spellpoint regeneration somewhat.
This item loses its magical powers very slowly.
The Brimstone Noose is an artifact of Kirvana's.
The Brimstone Noose can be commanded with 'noose_info'
